title: Tip Calculator
projectDescription: Made a interactive tip calculator following the design from the Frontend Mentor website.

title: Task Tracker
projectDescription: Made a simple task tracker app that allows the user to enter a task's name, description, due date, and a priority system with a dynamic to do list.

title: Sorting Data
projectDescription: Made a simple data sorting table that can sort between ID, First and Last name, Height, and Age for up to 50 people.
